affection_level.title: Affection level
affection_level.description: Reflects how much the breed enjoys being close to humans. High means very affectionate, while low means more independent.

adaptability.title: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Indicates how well the breed can adjust to changes in its environment. High means good with change, low means easily stressed.

energy_level.title: Energy level
energy_level.description: Indicates the breed's activity level and exercise needs. High means lots of playtime, low means more relaxed.

intelligence.title: Intelligence
intelligence.description: Reflects the breed's problem-solving ability. High means quick learner and curious, low means more laid-back.

vocalisation.title: Vocalisation
vocalisation.description: Refers to the sounds the breed makes. High means very vocal, low means generally quiet.

social_needs.title: Social needs
social_needs.description: Reflects the breed's need for social interaction and attention. High means needs attention, low means more content alone.
